last_episode_to_air.name: The Mettle of Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: Elk Grove undergoes a major battle that takes place on the streets, Ash rides high in a military tank, speeding across shaky, post-apocalyptic Elk Grove. Ash fights the biggest battle of them all - a sixty foot tall Kandarian demon.

name: Ash vs Evil Dead
overview: Bruce Campbell reprises his role as Ash Williams, an aging lothario and chainsaw-handed monster hunter who’s spent the last three decades avoiding maturity, and the terrors of the Evil Dead. But when a Deadite plague threatens to destroy all of mankind, he’s forced to face his demons — both metaphorical and literal.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Inside the World-Outtakes, behind the scenes, trailers.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Thirty years later, Ash Williams -- demon hunter par excellence -- is back to battle a new Deadite plague. He may have lost a hand, but not his touch.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two roars back into action with Ash leaving his beloved Jacksonville and returning to his hometown of Elk Grove, Michigan. There, he confronts Ruby. The former enemies have to form an uneasy alliance as Elk Grove soon becomes the nucleus of evil.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The third season finds Ash’s status in Elk Grove, Michigan has changed from murderous urban legend to humanity-saving hometown hero. When Kelly witnesses a televised massacre with Ruby’s fingerprints all over it, she returns with a new friend to warn Ash and Pablo that evil isn’t done with them yet. Blood is thicker than water in the battle of good vs Evil Dead!

tagline: It's time to test the mettle of man

episodes.name: El Jefe
episodes.overview: Ash is baaack! 30 years after his last Deadite fight, badass monster fighter Ash Williams unleashes the Evil in an act of stupidity, bringing Deadite mayhem into his life again.

episodes.name: Bait
episodes.overview: Special Agent Fisher is tracking Ash. Pablo gets his first taste of blood in a manic battle, and a revelation changes Kelly’s life forever.

episodes.name: Books from Beyond
episodes.overview: A mysterious woman finds the destruction at Kelly’s parents’ farm. Meanwhile, Ash, Pablo and Kelly reach Books from Beyond with the Necronomicon and Fisher finds herself in another terrifying, inexplicable situation.

episodes.name: Brujo
episodes.overview: Ruby helps Fisher and reveals her family’s connection to the Evil Dead. Ash and team follow a clue from the demon Eligos, but Kelly pays a price.

episodes.name: The Host
episodes.overview: Kelly’s current state puts others in jeopardy. This forces Pablo to make a brave move and Ash to reveal a new side to his character. Ruby and Fisher join forces in pursuit of Ash.

episodes.name: The Killer of Killers
episodes.overview: Thanks to his drug-induced vision, Ash knows what to do with the Necronomicon. Pablo and Kelly notice something ominous. Ash promises to visit Lem, but Fisher shows up for an almighty showdown with her former boss.

episodes.name: Fire in the Hole
episodes.overview: Ash, Pablo and Kelly, now joined by Fisher, arrive at the survivalist camp in the midst of chaos and must go to extreme measures to escape. Meanwhile, more is revealed of Ruby’s mission.

episodes.name: Ashes to Ashes
episodes.overview: Ash attempts to bury the book to end the Evil, but first he must contend with other, more physical things from his past. Fisher faces a horrific change in Ash.

episodes.name: Bound in Flesh
episodes.overview: Ash battles someone all too familiar, and later hears a message from the Necronomicon. Meanwhile, the deadliest Deadite attacks.

episodes.name: The Dark One
episodes.overview: A  last ditch effort to rid the world of Evil could leave Ash a changed man, as well as changing mankind forever.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Thirty years later, Ash Williams -- demon hunter par excellence -- is back to battle a new Deadite plague. He may have lost a hand, but not his touch.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Ash, Pablo and Kelly, summoned back to Ash's hometown by Ruby, form an unusual alliance. Once there, Ash's father and the local pub dwellers give the returning son a chilly reception.

episodes.name: The Morgue
episodes.overview: Pablo's grasp on reality is tested when Ruby reveals the Necronomicon has gifted him with premonitions. Meanwhile, in the morgue, Ash and Kelly discover Brock's date might not be the warm body he's banking on.

episodes.name: Last Call
episodes.overview: Local teens raise hell when they steal the Delta from Brock's house. Ash and his best buddy Chet devise a plan to throw a party at the bar, lure the thieves in, and get the Delta and the Necronomicon back .

episodes.name: DUI
episodes.overview: Ash goes on the hunt for his beloved Delta, but suddenly becomes the hunted. Meanwhile, Ruby and Kelly engage in a battle with the evil spawn while Pablo suffers from a new Necronomicon condition.

episodes.name: Confinement
episodes.overview: Ruby, Kelly and Pablo must break Ash out of jail after the Sheriff brings him up on charges.

episodes.name: Trapped Inside
episodes.overview: An angry mob corners Ash and the team in Brock's house while Ruby attempts to summon the spell to send Baal back to hell; Ash proves to the townsfolk that he is not a murderer, but a hero.

episodes.name: Delusion
episodes.overview: Ash wakes up in an asylum, and a seemingly helpful doctor tries desperately to get him to admit his horrific acts so his healing can begin.

episodes.name: Ashy Slashy
episodes.overview: Ruby, Kelly and Pablo go to look for Ash and Baal in an abandoned asylum and encounter some crazy characters. They are all players in Baal's attempt to break Ash and find the Necronomicon. But did his plan work?

episodes.name: Home Again
episodes.overview: Ash, distraught about losing Pablo is determined to bring him back! Ruby and Kelly tag along to make sure Young Ash never sees the Necronomicon. But the butterfly effect they create is something no one can believe!

episodes.name: Second Coming
episodes.overview: Ash, Ruby and Kelly battle the past to secure a future where Pablo is alive and the world is safe from evil, but the family from hell has other plans.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two roars back into action with Ash leaving his beloved Jacksonville and returning to his hometown of Elk Grove, Michigan. There, he confronts Ruby. The former enemies have to form an uneasy alliance as Elk Grove soon becomes the nucleus of evil.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.overview: After being the hero of Elk Grove by defeating evil and saving humanity, Ash settles in and opens a hardware store; his peace is short lived when evil returns with a target close to his heart.

episodes.name: Booth Three
episodes.overview: Ruby gives birth to a form of evil and disguises herself to bond with Brandy. Kelly returns with a friend who is leading the search for The One to defeat The Dark One, while Ash realizes evil is out to get his daughter.

episodes.name: Apparently Dead
episodes.overview: Ruby reveals herself to Ash as she tries to strengthen her bond with Brandy to defeat The Prophesized One; Pablo and Dalton continue to spar, unsure of one another.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: Brock warns Ash of an otherworldly hurricane brewing; Ash and Pablo make a discovery at the hardware store; Kelly and Brandy face a familiar foe.

episodes.name: Baby Proof
episodes.overview: Ruby's house of horrors reveals her master plan as well as a little bundle of joy that terrorizes Ash; Pablo's Brujo ties bring him back to the path he needs to take.

episodes.name: Tales from the Rift
episodes.overview: Ash's bond with his daughter strengthens as more Knights of Sumeria join Pablo and him to defeat evil; Kelly decides to go after Ruby while Ash, team, and the knights enter the rift and face a battle of their own.

episodes.name: Twist and Shout
episodes.overview: Ruby's latest creation is her most diabolical plan yet to turn Brandy against Ash; Pablo suspects something isn't right with Kelly when she meets him and Ash at the school; chaos ensues when evil shows up at the dance.

episodes.name: Rifting Apart
episodes.overview: Ash and Pablo realize the rift in the cellar is the key to saving humanity and devise a plan to save the ones they love.

episodes.name: Judgement Day
episodes.overview: Pablo's role as Brujo Especiale has him straddle the worlds of good and evil to keep the rift open for Ash to save Brandy and Kelly, but they run into a snag; Ruby and Kaya faceoff with The Dark One.

episodes.name: The Mettle of Man
episodes.overview: Elk Grove undergoes a major battle that takes place on the streets, Ash rides high in a military tank, speeding across shaky, post-apocalyptic Elk Grove. Ash fights the biggest battle of them all - a sixty foot tall Kandarian demon.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The third season finds Ash’s status in Elk Grove, Michigan has changed from murderous urban legend to humanity-saving hometown hero. When Kelly witnesses a televised massacre with Ruby’s fingerprints all over it, she returns with a new friend to warn Ash and Pablo that evil isn’t done with them yet. Blood is thicker than water in the battle of good vs Evil Dead!
